ygData.subject: Bard Guides
ygData.msgSnippet: There is/was a guide Bard on the Rathe server, I think he really was a bard on his main toon because if I ever sent him a /petition saying that I couldn t
ygData.messageBody:
There is/was a guide Bard on the Rathe server, I think he really was a bard
on his main toon because if I ever sent him a /petition saying that I
couldn't locate a body with my song he would respond within 15 sec. and come
look for himself. I also think he was the coolest guide in the program.

Pinen bard of 30 songs<retired>
Maxius mage 45th level


-----Original Message-----
At 11:13 AM 6/1/2001 -0400, you wrote:
>I don't believe I've ever seen a bard guide.
I have, however SEEN a Bard guide - but since you can't buy spells or songs
from real vendors,
